alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 5:57PM AKST until February 03 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Pelican, Elfin Cove, Petersburg, Wrangell. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 3 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected across portions of Southeast Alaska beginning this afternoon and continuing through early Thursday morning. Heaviest snowfall rates expected late tonight through Wednesday morning. Light freezing rain may mix in at times Wednesday afternoon and evening before a full transition to rain by Thursday. Confidence is low in the exact timing of the transition to rain as an earlier or later transition time will greatly impact snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
